      playerId - != NOPLAYER

      leader - .
      parameter - != null
      advanced - .
      Returns:
      a Player if advanced is false and nick is not contained in usedNicknames; an AdvancedPlayer if advanced is true and nick is not contained in usedNicknames; null if nick is contained in usedNicknames

    • getPlayer

      @Deprecated public static Player getPlayer(String nick, PlayerEnum playerId, TeamEnum teamColor, Wizard wizard, boolean leader, ParameterHandler parameters, boolean advanced)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a new player from the given parameters
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the player
      playerId - the id of the player
      teamColor - the color of the towers of the player
      wizard - the wizard chosen by the player
      leader - indicates whether the player is the leader of their team or not
      parameters - parameters of the game
      advanced - true if the player should be its advanced version
      Returns:
      a new player with the given characteristics

      wizard - the wizard chosen by the player
